title: Blended Simulation Training for Strengthening Child Protection Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of child welfare laws and related policies, practical experience in social welfare
context.additional_context: Program aimed at enhancing in-service professionals' ability to handle complex child protection cases, featuring immersive learning environments through smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners will apply child protection laws and policies to practical case studies
Learners will perform crisis situation judgment and intervention procedures with 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Develop practical improvement plans based on role-play feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
